pricing_notes: Pricing details are not explicitly listed; users are directed to contact for quotes.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Act on one journey point for your business
features: Track a single metric: NPS, CSAT, or CES
Multiple delivery channels: Web app, Mobile app, Email, Link, Intercom Messenger
Trigger surveys via Intercom, Zendesk, Freshdesk, and Mixpanel

limits.integrations: Zapier, Slack, Intercom, Zendesk, Freshdesk, Mixpanel, Segment

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Solutions for multiple CX journey points
features: Multiple delivery channels: Web app, Mobile app, Email, Link, Intercom Messenger, SMS
Trigger surveys from any integration partner

limits.integrations: Salesforce, Zapier, Slack, Intercom, Zendesk, Freshdesk, Mixpanel, Segment, Hubspot, ServiceNow, Microsoft, Heap

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Get every world-class feature included in our Growth plan PLUS additional advanced analytics and reporting features.
features: Import and analyze feedback from any source

limits.integrations: All integrations available in Growth plus additional custom integrations

original_app_metadata.name: Wootric by InMoment
original_app_metadata.description: Wootric by InMoment collects and manages customer feedback using proven CX metrics (Net Promoter Score® (NPS), CSAT, and Customer Effort Score (CES). Survey in-app, via mobile, email & SMS, track ongoing results, follow up with customers, and quickly surface insights in an easy-to-use dashboard.
